Description: You have failed to ensure that employers, and if necessary, self-employed persons, apply the general principles of prevention in a consistent manner in that you had agency joiners working on your sites who were cutting wood without taking the relevant measures to prevent or control exposure to wood dust, specifically, they had no dust extraction attached to wood cutting saws and didnâ€™t wear face fitted masks when cutting, persons were at risk of developing work place asthma and other respiratory diseases.
